text: Daniela Jolanta Denby-Ashe (born 9 August 1978) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the roles of Sarah Hills in the BBC soap opera EastEnders (1995–1999), Janey Harper in the BBC sitcom My Family (2000–2002, 2004–2011), Margaret Hale in the BBC period drama series North & South (2004), and Lorraine Donnegan in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2012–2013). ==Personal life== Denby-Ashe was born in North West London, the daughter of Polish immigrants. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English radio actors Category:Actors from London
title: Daniela Denby-Ashe
